content.en: Outlier detection: Researchers are exploring how algorithms can detect outliers in high-dimensional data by using concepts of proximity and behavior of projections. They are also investigating if outlier detection can be based on the distribution of distances between data points, with algorithms evaluating the outlier factor for each data point based on distance distribution. Additionally, algorithms are being developed to address challenges in outlier detection for high-dimensional data and to improve outlier detection using manifold models and graph structure analysis.
content.da: Outlier-detektion: Forskere udforsker, hvordan algoritmer kan opdage outliers i højdimensionelle data ved at bruge koncepter som nærhed og opførsel af projektioner. De undersøger også, om outlier-detektion kan baseres på fordelingen af afstande mellem datapunkter, hvor algoritmer vurderer outlier-faktoren for hvert datapunkt baseret på afstandsfordelingen. Derudover udvikles algoritmer for at tackle udfordringer i outlier-detektion for højdimensionelle data og for at forbedre outlier-detektion ved hjælp af manifold-modeller og grafstruktur-analyse.
